attributes.action: Include members sister and brother in family reunion for pre settled status
attributes.additional_details: I requesting this status be eligible as well for brothers sisters because as well they are part of the family.
attributes.background: Family members can get pre-settled status or settled status for family reunion just for kids, parents and partners. To accept that for the family reunion to accept brothers, sisters ​​because they are also part of the whole family.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/640471
